sources.title: The Ghost Town (1944)
sources.description: A Terrytoons cartoon released 22 September 1944. Gandy Goose and Sour Puss are a couple of prospectors looking for a place to stay overnight. When a ghostly vulture eats their horse, they hole up in Ghost Town, named for its occupants, in this funny and scary Halloween cartoon. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-ghost-town-1944/

metadata.Plot: Gandy Goose and Sourpuss are prospectors looking for a place to spend the night.
metadata.Writer: John Foster, Donald McKee, Tom Morrison
